verse: उदशराव आत्मानमवेक्ष्य यदात्मनो न विजानीथस्तन्मे प्रब्रूतमिति तौ होदशरावेऽवेक्षांचक्राते तौ ह प्रजापतिरुवाच किं पश्यथ इति तौ होचतुः सर्वमेवेदमावां भगव आत्मानं पश्याव आ लोमभ्यः आ नखेभ्यः प्रतिरूपमिति॥
meaning: Translation:Udasharaav, after seeing his own self, not understanding it, said to me, "Please tell me". Then, those two made a circle by Hodasharaav seeing. Prajapati said, "What do you see?" Those two responded, "We indeed see everything, Oh Lord, we see the self with the hairs and nails as the reflection."
